title: Track and Field Throw Distance Laser Measuring Device
description: The code and circuit diagram used to create a laser measuring device designed to measure distances thrown in a Track and Field throwing event.

title: Track and Field Throw Manager
description: A program to manage data regarding the Throwing events for Track and Field. The program includes a UI to allow data to be more easily managed. Made with the Qt Creator IDE.

title: NuGet Package Manager / Visualizer
description: Currently in development. This project will allow users to view the packages they have installed in their projects as a diagram and will allow them to see vulnerabilities or deprications of packages in use. Project link not yet available.

title: Slipshod
description: It's a 2D auto scrolling narrative game that is currently in development. Link not yet allowed to the public.
